commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from dfuch/jndi_fix

[lworld][idobj_intf] Fix test/jdk/javax/naming/module/RunBasic.java by updating the .ldap replay files
[lworld][idobj_intf] Update copyright and fix comments in modified files

[lworld][idobj_intf] Fix test/jdk/javax/naming/module/RunBasic.java by updating the .ldap replay files

The addition of the new java.lang.IdentityObject interface changes the java serialization bytes
of java serialized objects. The StoreObject and StoreRemote tests run by RunBasic store
javaSerializedObject in a LDAP server, and thus LDAP requests emitted by the LDAP client contain
java serialized bytes embedded within the LDAP request. Although the serialization bytes are
different, the serialized forms remain compatible. But the test server is a dummy SocketServer
that is only able to replay pre-recorded conversations. Because the LDAP request bytes have changed,
the dummy test server cannot match the request it receives with any pre-recorded requests, and
the whole test fails. The fix updates the two pre-recorded conversations that contained java
serialization bytes with requests containing the new serial bytes sent by the client, so that
the dummy server can match the new client request bytes with its pre-recorded conversation.
